name: Bash Town
description:
Bash Town is a port of Batch Town by General Nut.
Bash Town runs on Unix-like operating systems (MacOS and Linux)

This is a port of v0.1, It won't be getting updates as a new Batch Town had been announced right after the port was completed.

If you have any questions or problems, feel free to tell me.

Batch Town Discord server: https://discord.gg/T6DwYjn
